input: 01 : Refer to issuer - The issuing bank prevented the transaction without a specific reason
expected_output: The issuing bank prevented the transaction.
context: 01 Refer to issuer - The issuing bank prevented the transaction without a specific reason The issuing bank prevented the transaction.

input: 02 : Refer to issuer (special condition) - The customer's bank prevented the transaction
expected_output: The customer's bank prevented the transaction.
context: 02 Refer to issuer (special condition) - The customer's bank prevented the transaction The customer's bank prevented the transaction.

input: 03 : Invalid merchant - Merchant not recognized or invalid
expected_output: Invalid merchant.
context: 03 Invalid merchant - Merchant not recognized or invalid Invalid merchant.

input: 04 : Pick up card (no fraud) - Bank wants merchant to hold the card (overdrawn/expired)
expected_output: The customer's bank prevented the transaction and is also telling the merchant to hold the card. This doesn't imply fraud, but rather overdrawn cards or expired ones.
context: 04 Pick up card (no fraud) - Bank wants merchant to hold the card (overdrawn/expired) The customer's bank prevented the transaction and is also telling the merchant to hold the card. This doesn't imply fraud, but rather overdrawn cards or expired ones.

input: 05 : Do not honor - Bank told merchant not to accept the card
expected_output: The customer's bank stopped the transaction and told the merchant to 'not honor' the card.
context: 05 Do not honor - Bank told merchant not to accept the card The customer's bank stopped the transaction and told the merchant to 'not honor' the card.

expected_output: The issuing bank can't specify the error, but something went wrong with the transaction.
context: 06 Error - Unspecified transaction error The issuing bank can't specify the error, but something went wrong with the transaction.

input: 07 : Pick up card (fraud) - Card flagged as fraudulent
expected_output: The customer's bank stopped the transaction because the card or bank account has been flagged as fraudulent.
context: 07 Pick up card (fraud) - Card flagged as fraudulent The customer's bank stopped the transaction because the card or bank account has been flagged as fraudulent.

input: 08 : Pick up card (fraud) - Card flagged as fraudulent
expected_output: Pick up card (fraud) - Card flagged as fraudulent
context: 08 Pick up card (fraud) - Card flagged as fraudulent Pick up card (fraud) - Card flagged as fraudulent

input: 09 : Pick up card (fraud) - Card flagged as fraudulent
expected_output: Pick up card (fraud) - Card flagged as fraudulent
context: 09 Pick up card (fraud) - Card flagged as fraudulent Pick up card (fraud) - Card flagged as fraudulent

input: 10 : Partial approval - Bank accepts partial payment but blocks the rest
expected_output: The issuing bank accepts a part of the payment but blocks the rest, typically due to exceeding the credit limit or funds in the account.
context: 10 Partial approval - Bank accepts partial payment but blocks the rest The issuing bank accepts a part of the payment but blocks the rest, typically due to exceeding the credit limit or funds in the account.

input: 12 : Invalid transaction - Transaction type is invalid
expected_output: The transaction attempted is invalid.
context: 12 Invalid transaction - Transaction type is invalid The transaction attempted is invalid.

input: 13 : Invalid amount - Invalid transaction amount entered
expected_output: The amount you entered for the transaction was invalid.
context: 13 Invalid amount - Invalid transaction amount entered The amount you entered for the transaction was invalid.

input: 14 : Invalid account number - Card number is invalid
expected_output: The card number is invalid.
context: 14 Invalid account number - Card number is invalid The card number is invalid.

expected_output: An unknown error occurred.
context: 19 Re-enter transaction - Unknown error occurred An unknown error occurred.
